content: महत्तर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Greater, larger &c. --रः {@--1@} The principal, chief, or eldest person, the most respectable person; रघुकुलमहत्तराणां वधूः <ls>U. 4</ls>; गृहपतिश्च ममांतरंगभूतो जनपदमहत्तरः <ls>Dk.</ls> {@--2@} A Chamberlain. {@--3@} A courtier. {@--4@} The head or the oldest man of a village.
